roleset.name: pass time idly, probably in a semi-horizontal position

example.name: usually with LOC
example.text: Here, in the old days -- when they had come to see the moon or displays of fireworks -- sat the king and his court while priests, soldiers, and other members of the party lounged in the smaller alcoves between.
example.arg: priests, soldiers, and other members of the party

example.name: lounge about
example.text: They got tin cups of coffee from the big pot on the coosie's fire, rolled and lighted brown-paper cigarettes, lounged about.

roleset.note: LOUNGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lounge' based on sentences in brown. (from lounge.01-v predicate notes)
